The Checklist user should also tell the mother (and birth companion) soon after birth  
(within one hour) to alert a health-care worker immediately if any of the following danger 
signs for the baby develop in the postnatal period: fast breathing or difficulty breathing, fever, 
unusually cold, stoping feeding well, less activity than normal, or whole body becomes
